name: OLIGHT Arkfeld Pro Rechargeable EDC Flat Flashlight with Green Beam, UV and White LED Combo, 1300 Lumens Portable Pocket Lights, Triple Sources for Outdoors Emergency Working (OD-Green CW)
short_description: The output of the green beam is ≤5mW, the class is 3R

[Three-in-One Functionality] Provides an impressive maximum brightness of 1300 lumens for excellent illumination. Arkfeld pro combines white light, UV, and green beam in a single flashlight, offering versatility for a wide range of applications
[Higher UV Intensity] High-power output of up to 900mW at a 365nm wavelength, offering a purer and more professional UV light experience compared to standard 395nm UV lights
[Battery Level Indicator] Includes a five-level battery indicator for easy monitoring of battery status, ensuring you are aware of the available power
[Convenient to Operate] Easily switch between the three lighting modes using the intuitive circular selector, allowing for seamless adjustments to suit different lighting needs

name: Rechargeable Green Laser Pointer High Power, Long Range Green Beam Laser Pointer with Star Cap for Astronomy, Architecture, Outdoor Adventures
short_description: 【Green Laser】Rotate to remove the star cap and experience a long range green laser beam. The laser pointer output power ≤ 0.39mW, Class 1 Laser
【Multiple Modes】The long range laser pointer has a rotatable star shaped cap head that rotates to show a beautiful star shaped cap projection.
【High Quality】The shell of this green laser pointer is made of high-quality aluminum alloy material, which is comfortable to the touch and portable design.
【Rechargeable】High power laser pointer, no need to buy batteries, rechargeable, USB port at the bottom, lightweight and convenient, long life.
【Wide Use】The green laser pointer is lightweight and suitable for astronomy, pointing out the stars, camping, hunting etc.

name: Green Presentation Pointer High Power Long Range with USB Cable, Rechargeable Green Beam Light Flashlight with Adjustable Focus for Night Astronomy, Outdoor Work, Pet Interaction, Conference
short_description: Easy to Charge: The green presentation pointer with USB charging cable. It can be charged with USB without disassembling the battery. Whether you use a computer, laptop, phone charger, or power bank, the green beam light pen can be easily charged

Ultra-Bright and Ultra-Long: The light is very bright with external focus, and it is easy to adjust the beam thickness, spot size,you can see it even at noon. Multi-purpose to use it to point at any desired targets. The light can reach 1500 meters at night
Widely Used: The presentation pointer is ideal for presentations, lectures, astronomy enthusiasts, construction work, hiking, camping, playing with your pet, and etc.

High-Quality Material: The high power presentation pointer is made of high-quality aluminum alloy frosted shell, comfortable to hand, strong and durable. The carefully designed hand strap makes it easy to hold and carry

Instructions and Caution: Press the push button to turn it on, then release the push button to shut it off automatically. Do not use the light directly on humans or animals' eyes, and keep it away from children.

name: [Professional] Rechargeable Green Line Light Flashlight Long Distance Range for TV/LED/LCD Screens Tactical Flashlights Presentation Office/Outdoors/Astronomic/Construction [001]
short_description: [Good Quality & Long Distance] This flashlight is made of aluminum alloy, very strong and durable, good quality, and it has a non-slip design, long distance range.[001]

[Rechargeable Design] The light flashes when the battery is low. Just rotate the lid off the bottom of the product and you can charge it, It is compatible with all USB-A chargers, Whether it's a computer, a laptop, a phone charger, a powerbank, or a plugboard, you can charge it with a USB port. Charge it for half an hour and you can use it for hours on end.[001]

[Starlight Pattern] Press down the star cap and rotate it to remove the star cap, then you can see a straight green light in the dark, and you can see different starlight patterns when you install the star cap. You can use it in many situations, such as construction sites, outdoor adventures, classrooms, meeting presentations, and other fun uses.[001]
[Notice] Do not use the light directly at human's or animal's eyes, and keep it away from children.[001]
[Our Services] Ourproduct comes with a 1-year warranty, if you have any questions or our flashlight have some defects, please contact us for further assistance.[001]
